actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions.

committees.committee: Senate Health, Education, Labor, and Pensions

official_title: A bill to protect survivors from brain injury by authorizing the Secretary of Health and Human Services to collect data on the prevalence of brain injuries resulting from domestic and sexual violence.
short_title: Protecting Survivors from Traumatic Brain Injury Act of 2023

summary.text:
Protecting Survivors from Traumatic Brain Injury Act of 2023

This bill requires the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to collect and analyze data about brain injuries resulting from domestic or sexual violence and publish its findings.

titles.title: Protecting Survivors from Traumatic Brain Injury Act of 2023
Protecting Survivors from Traumatic Brain Injury Act of 2023

A bill to protect survivors from brain injury by authorizing the Secretary of Health and Human Services to collect data on the prevalence of brain injuries resulting from domestic and sexual violence.
